Skills¶

Skill¶

class scripts.skills.skill.SkillData(name: str = 'None', description: str = 'None', icon: str = 'None', resource_type: str = 'None', resource_cost: int = 0, time_cost: int = 0, cooldown: int = 0, target_directions: List[scripts.core.constants.Directions] = <factory>, range: int = 1, terrain_collision: scripts.core.constants.SkillTerrainCollisions = None, travel_type: scripts.core.constants.SkillTravelTypes = None, expiry_type: scripts.core.constants.SkillExpiryTypes = None, required_tags: List[scripts.core.constants.TargetTags] = <factory>, shape: scripts.core.constants.SkillShapes = None, shape_size: int = 1, effects: Dict = <factory>, modifiers: List = <factory>)[source]¶

Data class for a skill. Used by the library to load from json.
